attributes.action: abolish or elect barons, baronesses and viscounts
attributes.additional_details: The house of lords is being reformed into a 300 member fully elected senate, though the house of lords reform bill. If the government is replacing 800 lords with 300 elected senators, then they should also abolish the posts of barons, baronesses and viscounts. if the government does not wont to abolish these posts them they should amend the bill, so that the electorate can elect the barons, baronesses and viscounts.
